description: This file provides a frontend web interface for exploring PostgreSQL databases, listing databases and tables, and displaying table data dynamically with features like expandable cells, loading states, and error handling.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases by reloading from the server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database to show or hide its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and renders it in a table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates an HTML table from data and inserts into container.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for a cell, handling nulls, objects, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long text or objects.
